fullwavepy.ioapi.segy¶

This module serves to read/write files in formats defined by Fullwave3D’s segy IO API, in particular SEG-Y files.

(c) 2019-2020 Kajetan Chrapkiewicz. Copywright: Ask for permission writing to k.chrapkiewicz17@imperial.ac.uk.

Functions

array2sgy(fname, A, dt, **kwargs)

Export an array to a .sgy file.

header2csv(fname[, keys, suffix, overwrite])

Read trace-header values.

header2json(fname, **kwargs)

Wrapper around read_header!

read_geo(fname[, unit])

Read .geo files (Fullwave’s format of sources/receivers files).

read_sgy(fname[, overwrite])

Read a .sgy file through conversion to .vtr.

sgy2vtr(fname[, nx])

Convert sgy to vtr using Fullwave3D’s sgy2vtr Fortran utility.

split_sgy(fname, key[, value])

Split a sgy file into smaller files, one file for each value of the key.

vtr2sgy(fname, dt, **kwargs)

fname : str
